trigger_prototype.name: High Temperature on Optical Module ML: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression:
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) <= ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThresholdML[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}))
and
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) <> -40)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression:
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) > ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThresholdML[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}))
and
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) <> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Low Rx Signal on Optical Module ML: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression:
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) <= ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThresholdML[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}))
and
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) <> -40)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression:
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) > ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThresholdML[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}))
and
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) <> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Low Tx Signal on Optical Module ML: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression:
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()} <= {$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}) or ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()} <= {$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}) or ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()} <= {$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}) or ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()} <= {$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}))
and
(({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} or {Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}) <> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Signal Atenuation on Optical Module ML: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}

trigger_prototype.name: High Temperature on Optical Module SL: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} <= ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} * 0.93)) and ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} <> -40)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} > ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} * 0.93)) and ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} <> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Low Rx Signal on Optical Module SL: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} <= ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} * 0.93)) and ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} <> -40)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} > ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} * 0.93)) and ({Template Optical Modules Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()} <> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Low Tx Signal on Optical Module SL: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}
Signal Atenuation on Optical Module SL: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}
